snippet: Some local residents and business owners fear this historic immigrant community is now threatened by the newest big-box addition to the neighborhood.
abstract: Residents and business owners in Chinatown in Los Angeles fear that the historic immigrant community is threatened by the planned construction of a Walmart; since the company announced its plans to build a store in the neighborhood where small businesses have thrived for more than 70 years, a furious battle has broken out over the project.
lead_paragraph: Some local residents and business owners fear this historic immigrant community is now threatened by the newest big-box addition to the neighborhood.

headline.main: A Walmart for Chinatown Stirs a Fight in Los Angeles
headline.print_headline: A Walmart for Chinatown Stirs a Fight in Los Angeles
